txt.en: 'Orcs! These creatures bear the markings of the White Hand. What are Saruman's cronies doing here in the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb>?\n\n'I believe it is time to do some Orc-hunting, as well. Are you with me?'
'There is little worse than Orcs in this world. They may not be the most powerful creatures of evil, but they are among the most proliferate.'
Andreg is taking you to meet with Saeradan at the Rohirrim scout-camp; however, he needs help with his own mission first.
Andreg asked you to help him hunt Orcs in the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb>.
You should speak with Andreg regarding your successes against the Orcs of the White Hand in the <rgb=#FFFF00>South Gravenwood</rgb>.
